summary.Title: Group Business Analytics Lead for Unifeeder, Aarhus

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Group Business Analytics Lead for Unifeeder, Aarhus
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a senior talent who has an analytical mindset combined with a strong business understanding. If you want to be part of an international company that is on a growth journey, then you might be Unifeeder's new Group Business Analytics Lead.

betterpeople A/S is on behalf of Unifeeder searching for a Group Business Analytics Lead to the Unifeeder Headquarter.

Career opportunities in a global environment   
As a Group Business Analytics Lead at Unifeeder, you will be part of a finance department with great development potential where you will get professional and skilled colleagues who challenge each other to find the best solutions. Unifeeder has an energetic work environment which includes a dynamic approach and a strong team spirit among colleagues in both Aarhus, Singapore, Dubai, and Limassol.   

This large international organization values procedures and structure, but as a result of their growth journey they are open to updating, reassessing, and changing the way they do things. At Unifeeder, you will work close to the management in an organization with short decision paths and good development opportunities. They offer you a flexible and versatile work life filled with development, challenge, and inspiration. 

Lead responsibility and business development  
As a Group Business Analytics Lead, your most important task will be to create scalable solutions for a growing business, and you will have to drive and develop the business as well as change processes. In addition, you will help advance the data-driven agenda of Unifeeder, and you will have the strategic responsibility of providing analytics to decision makers, standardizing and optimizing reporting, identifying challenges, and solving them using data. There will be about 5-10 travel days a year.  

You will be creating tools aiding Unifeeder’s performance management, making sure the team functions and the goals are met effectively. You are successful in the role when you assist the Group FBP to run the department smoothly and transform it into a central part of the decision-making process in Unifeeder in terms of whether ideas are financially sound to initiate. Therefore, it is essential that you can lead projects and assist the team in terms of guiding them into the right projects and prioritizing correctly in relation to tasks, analyses, and reports. 

A good communicator  
You hold a cand.merc.fir., cand.polit., cand.merc.BI., cand.merc.FIB. or a corresponding master's degree with a mix of business and mathematics, statistics and economics and finance. More importantly, you are interested in data and have previous experience from a similar role in a large and complex organization. Additionally, you have leadership ambitions. 

As a person, you are respectful, outgoing, and curious about Unifeeder’s business. You have strong communication skills, and you can make complex information understandable to everyone in the organization. You master English written and verbally at a professional level. 

You are structured, willing to adapt and enjoy working in a fast-paced and agile work environment. You are enthusiastic about new challenges, and you have a great interest in data and analysis as well as experience in Power BI and SQL. 

Unifeeder 
Unifeeder Group is a dynamic logistics company, covering Europe, the Middle East, Asia and the Wider Indian Subcontinent. They operate more than 150 vessels and make the way for +5,2 Mio. containers every year.   

Unifeeder simplifies the complex tasks of choosing and managing supply chains by providing efficient and sustainable transport solutions. By expanding the network, coming up with innovative solutions and being agile in day-to-day operations, they enable their customers to concentrate on their core business while Unifeeder makes their cargo flow.   

As a key player in global and regional supply chains, they recognize their environmental responsibilities and are committed to contributing to the reduction of local, national & global emissions. 

The recruitment is handled by betterpeople A/S  
The position is to be filled as soon as possible, and we will be processing applications continuously. However, we are willing to wait for the right candidate. If you have any questions, please contact Cecillie Meilby Lyngstrand at e-mail cml@betterpeople.dk. All applications are handled confidentially and with discretion. With reference to the GDPR regulations, applications are ONLY received through the link on our website. If you cannot upload your application through this link, please contact us.  

PLEASE NOTE: Our job advertisement is automatically and continuously renewed on job portals until the position is filled. A renewal of the job advertisement is not an expression of a reposting, although it may appear so.  

(C) betterpeople A/S
